name: EarthCam
0:
”Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me a sunrise.”
”Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me a sunset.”
”Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me something cool.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: earthcam
Developer Terms of Use
des:
EarthCam is the world’s favorite webcam network and has been connecting people with unique and interesting locations through live camera technology since 1996. Now, the EarthCam skill delivers this same high-quality video content directly to your video-enabled Alexa devices. 

 

Getting started is easy! Our EarthCam skill is free for all Alexa users. Ask Alexa to open EarthCam, where you can say:

 

“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me a sunrise.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me a sunset.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me Times Square.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me New Orleans.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me Dublin.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me Miami.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me Las Vegas.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me Wrigley Field.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me bird cam.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me Niagara Falls.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me the beach.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me Budapest.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me Mulberry Street.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me The World Trade Center.”
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me Space.”


 

EarthCam will also play recently captured clips so you can experience beautiful views 24/7. 

 

“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me some place interesting.” 
“Alexa, ask EarthCam to show me something cool.”

 

Experience live views from some of EarthCam’s most popular cameras, such as New Orleans, Lauderdale-By-The-Sea, Budapest, Dublin, New York and even space! While we would love to deliver views of any location around the world, we are highlighting nearly 100 cameras within the EarthCam Network to ensure users are experiencing the best views possible. Make sure to check back often to see a variety of live webcam content, including new cameras added to our skill.

 

Have questions, suggestions or feedback? We’d love to hear from you! Please contact us at mobilesupport@earthcam.com.

Note: You can only use this skill on devices with a screen display
